item.title: Autumn 2007, Russian State Music Center
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Autumn 2007, the Russian State Music Center released an album of popular music performed by the Yuri Silantiev Academic Grand Concert Orchestra, which includes several...
item.content:encoded: Autumn 2007, the Russian State Music Center released an album of popular music performed by the Yuri Silantiev Academic Grand Concert Orchestra, which includes several pieces arranged by Aslan Gotov

item.title: 2007. Alexander Dobronravov
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: 2007, orchestration of the concert program “How evenings are ravishing in Russia” of popular composer and singer Alexander Dobronravov.
item.content:encoded: 2007, orchestration of the concert program “How evenings are ravishing in Russia” of popular composer and singer Alexander Dobronravov.

item.title: June 2007. Joseph Kobzon
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: June 2007, a solo album of the People’s Artist of USSR Joseph Kobzon, for recording, dedicated to his 70-th anniversary, was arranged by Aslan Gotov
item.content:encoded: June 2007, a solo album of the People’s Artist of USSR Joseph Kobzon, for recording, dedicated to his 70-th anniversary, was arranged by Aslan Gotov
